findings.rationale: An indefinite term may expose the Receiving Party to perpetual obligations without a clear endpoint, increasing risk of unintentional breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Specificity in Confidential Information
findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information may lead to ambiguity, making it difficult to determine what is protected and increasing the risk of disputes.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party to the Receiving Party.

findings.rationale: The absence of limitations on damages for breach may expose the Receiving Party to significant financial liability in case of a violation.
findings.evidence_quote: No limitations on damages are specified in the text provided.
